title: Can you Read This? (Or: how I Improved Text Readability on the Web for the Visually Impaired)
description:
Speaker:: Asya Frumkin

Track: PyData: Computer Vision
I will explain my approach of detecting texts on top of an image background that are unreadable to people with visual impairment. I will explain the challenges I. encountered when using different OCR architectures for this task and talk about the solution I came up with.


Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2022 conference, April 11-13 2022.
https://2022.pycon.de
More details at the conference page: https://2022.pycon.de/program/MCLBLZ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
